text: Kosovo declared independence from Serbia in 2008. Some governments say that Kosovo is independent, and some say that it is not. The Government of Serbia has not said Kosovo is a sovereign state, but has traded with Kosovo since 2020.Serbia to move embassy to Jerusalem; mostly Muslim Kosovo to recognize Israel, The Times of Israel, 9 April 2020 As of 12 April 2025, 108 out of 193 (56%) members of the United Nations have said that Kosovo is independent. == References == Category:Kosovo
title: International recognition of Kosovo
